g.text: User C(same as A)Central node with SGX enabled
User AppJava, Python, go, rust, C#, …
Customer-specific logicCross languages framework based on Gramine
Language translation layer-upper edge:receive client app non-c invocation-bottom edge:invoke the common client module clf_client to do the real functionality④⑤⑥⑦
Common library –clf_client-Provide three types of function (get key/get data/push result)-Connect to clf_server via TLS channel
